str_EB133F16: Part One: Meeting in Coastal Waters
str_62C9C868: Casual Top with Ring and Denim Shorts
str_D561FE98: Club Leggings and Transparent Tank Top
str_0773BEA9: So here we are at the beach.
str_CA0D8E82: Miranda and I had been planning this trip together after exams for a long time.
str_09BFF82B: All exams are passed, studies are behind us, and in three months we'll go to different universities.
str_1B66C84E: So this trip should be our farewell to the past and the beginning of something new.
str_90D3CE25: Hey, why did you stop? Who's going to set up the tent?
str_BC20DBE4: Warning! Some of your actions may affect the course of the story.
str_9D930FCD: Can we at least swim? Please! We walked so long to get here. I can't stand this heat anymore.
str_4D58287E: So what should I tell her?
str_F47E241D: Just be quick! Or we'll waste the whole day.
str_43743C85: Choose your appearance before starting the story
str_EBF79EA0: We entered the water, and goosebumps covered my body. The smell of salt and fresh air made me forget about the whole world around us for a second.
str_B1307960: The sunlight reflected off the smooth, barely noticeable waves like a kaleidoscope, playfully inviting my body and mind to another, shadowy space.
str_F72B4F72: But Miranda's voice brought me back to reality...
str_DCE39A2D: Let's run! We'll get used to the water faster that way!
str_10B6BBD3: We ran towards the morning waves and started splashing water at each other with screams.
str_792B001D: Okay, we cooled down, that's enough. We still need to set up the tent.
str_2AE47509: We came out of the sea.
str_4E5BAF2E: Drops of salt water sparkled like tiny crystals on our slightly tanned bodies.
str_297AFBDC: Our bodies quickly got used to the sea temperature, and we continued fooling around for a couple more minutes.
str_CA2C44CD: Something's not clear here, what color is our tent?
str_35BCF84F: Okay, don't forget to do the main thing!
str_BB73E49D: Alright. So, what do I need to do?
str_2928AD22: Perfect! Now let's think about having some real fun.
str_A50B9826: Could we just spend the whole day lounging on the beach?
str_6B6A2799: We'll have time for that. We need to find the hottest party spot here. We came for adventures!
str_8B06A37C: Of course, we'll go to a local band's concert tonight. I already checked. The concert is at 7 PM.
str_D1D1D024: Then we still have a couple of hours to lounge and sunbathe.
str_8ACE628C: Miranda and I laid out towels and started sunbathing under the summer sun.
str_29847F87: Our bodies gradually warmed up, and our skin, moisturized with sunscreen, glistened pleasantly.
str_637B9CA5: I noticed the outline of a yacht appearing in the coastal waters.
str_20D0F6B9: Miranda, look! There's a yacht out at sea, it's so big.
str_8B13C6B5: Well, more like medium-sized. But it's still interesting. Maybe there are some guys on it?
str_50B091BA: Looks like it's going to be a hot day!
str_6720FCBB: The main thing is that they're nice people. Who they are isn't that important!
str_A593FB37: Hmm. What difference does it make? We're not going to approach them, are we?
str_C066BAD3: Yes, babe! We're going to party!
str_E58D036C: I don't know about nice, but I think they might surprise us!
str_23C476A2: Miranda got up from her towel and started waving at the passing yacht.
str_2BB2E8E0: What are you doing? We don't know who's there!
str_5C1FE3AD: Probably some young, fun people with money. Such acquaintances won't hurt us!
str_C3067075: The yacht changed course and approached the shore. Two muscular male silhouettes became visible on it.
str_C5E0B7DB: Miranda looked at the yacht with interest.
str_9CBCCB38: The yacht stopped in the coastal waters, and the guys got on jet skis and headed towards us.
str_ADAD6096: God, look at those handsome guys. I call dibs on the dark-haired one!
str_2DA7F895: I looked at the young men. They were indeed very attractive.
str_2B802345: While Miranda was shamelessly staring at the yacht, the guys had already reached the shore and parked their jet skis.
str_6B622357: Hi, girls! I'm Edwin, and this is Mark!
str_403F41F1: Miranda gave me a meaningful look, clearly indicating that I should introduce myself.
str_4C3B53BB: Miranda suddenly pushed me aside and said: 'It's so great we met.'
str_04F3572B: Edwin smiled at me, slightly embarrassed.
str_612FFDE3: This is Alice. It's our first day here, but we're ready to party hard!
str_FAFCDDAD: Haha, you're quick. Do you live right on the beach?
str_40D520AE: Stand up and wave with Miranda
str_AB7413D7: Stand up and look at the yacht with interest
str_C1C05402: Yes, but if we find a more interesting spot...
str_97C17D8E: Well, we want to be near the sea!
str_D785A601: It's not such a bad option.
str_CB7CA2F6: Anyway, if we find a more interesting spot, we'll think about changing locations.
str_4A3440D6: I think it's a great option to always be near the sea, watch sunsets and sunrises, fall asleep under the starry sky.
str_D7CC0DA6: I mean, it might be dangerous. This is a wild beach—no lifeguards, no security.
str_34433068: Well then, it's good we met you. You can keep an eye on us!
str_5695D367: I think we can arrange that!
str_87ADDAA2: The guys sat down near us, and we chatted for a while.
str_D4032E09: It turned out that Edwin lives in the area and owns a nightclub where we planned to go for the concert tonight.
str_9CB42A59: And Mark isn't from here. He only comes in the summer to relax and run one of his seasonal businesses.
str_A907546C: So, are you staying here long?
str_45D19FDE: Why? Do you want to spend more time with us?
str_EA6ACAC2: Edwin thinks you're flirting with him.
str_59E39F8E: Maybe we could exchange numbers, Alice? Just in case. In case you need that promised protection on the wild beach?
str_037EBE2E: Sorry, I didn't realize it might seem too fast.
str_62DA393A: Now you can talk to Edwin on the phone.
str_959217CC: The guy raised an eyebrow and looked puzzled at our tent standing alone on the sand.
str_96F82103: Do you live right on the beach?
str_2DE47FFC: You know who's always ready for a little phone chat? That's right—me! Mark, you can write down my number, by the way.
str_2D01285F: Yeah, sure. Alice, what about you?
str_9A2F60C2: Mark glanced awkwardly at Miranda but decided to support her initiative.
str_714B8E9F: At that moment, Miranda gave me a reproachful look.
str_AF3725B3: Now you can talk to Mark on the phone.
str_6182709B: The guys stayed a little longer and chatted with us, then talked about continuing our acquaintance.
str_3ED61BC4: Maybe we'll meet tonight after your concert?
str_8E58169F: Why not? I think it's a good idea.
str_DFFF7EA0: The guys leisurely got on their jet skis and headed back to the yacht.
str_A91B6678: Seems like we've been lying in the sun too long. I felt my skin starting to hurt from sudden movements.
str_8AB9C36C: It's time to get ready for the concert.
str_DCEB51DD: Was it just me, or were you flirting with Mark?
str_BD04481F: Sorry, it was accidental. Didn't mean to upset you, just trying to be nice.
str_C585700E: Really? Tonight, be nice to Edwin, and leave Mark to me.
str_73557CBC: I hope so, because I really liked him.
str_994BDD22: It's not my fault I attract guys' attention. Besides, we're here on vacation. We'll leave soon and forget everything that happened.
str_3530C99E: You were shamelessly staring at Mark. I told you I like him!
str_762A0BD2: You imagined it. I just said hi to him.
str_C7C9C12F: They're so sweet! How do you like Edwin?
str_03EF38A8: I don't think I need a vacation fling.
str_7B057D9E: He seemed like a nice guy.
str_CA32D845: I don't know, I liked Mark.
str_7D3AB311: Alright, let's get ready for the concert.
str_FB33741F: I'm not sure I have the right clothes.
str_5068E5EA: I thought camping meant we'd be in the forest or on the beach all the time. I didn't plan for this kind of vacation.
str_C6E5D3EE: Then take something from my clothes.
str_3DF0AC64: I think I hear some strange noise.
str_16807308: It's right near us. Let's check it out.
str_0258ABB3: The girls stepped away from the tent and saw a male figure. The man seemed to be talking to himself and nervously fidgeting with something in his hands.
str_D7791C8A: The figure suddenly turned and walked straight toward us.
str_D23FD5B1: The man said threateningly as he approached us closely.
